correct email Hi Team,

We got an invitation from IPS Intelligent solutions authorised channel partner for Xtrutech GmbH for plastivision expo (Global conference for plastic industry – A dive into business opportunities).

The most interesting part is they are introducing new technology for Extruder screw cleaning technology in 30 min which will help us in extruder screw cleaning. 

Please find the completed detail about the expo in the below given link

:

[Link]

Kindly let me know if you would like to attend this conference and explore this new technology.

Thank you.

Best regards,

[Your Name]
